constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 79 (Friday, May 7, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. BOEBERT:
H.R. 3014.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article IV, Section 3, Clause 2 (the Property Clause).
Under this clause, Congress has the power to dispose of
and make all needful rules and regulations respecting the
territory or other property belonging to the United States.
[Page H2152]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation and Forestry.

title: 30 x 30 Termination Act
